PARAMS.ERRORTEXT1: Number must be a positive integer
PARAMS.ERRORTEXT2: This field is outside the range of acceptable values, it should be between 0 and 100
PARAMS.ERRORTEXT4: This field is outside the range of acceptable values, it should be between 1 and 100000
PARAMS.ERRORTEXT5: Maximum Results cannot be less than 1, resetting to 1000
PARAMS.ERRORTEXT6: Maximum Results cannot be more than 1000000000, resetting to 1000
PARAMS.ERRORTEXT7: This field is outside the range of acceptable values, it should be between 1 and 1000
